means: 双语的，两种语言的，能说两种语言的

sentence.Network_en: She is bilingual in English and Punjabi.
sentence.Network_cn: 她会说英语和旁遮普语。

sentence.Network_en: She works as a bilingual secretary for an insurance company.
sentence.Network_cn: 她为一家保险公司做双语秘书.

sentence.Network_en: He is virtually bilingual in Spanish and Portuguese.
sentence.Network_cn: 他实际上讲西班牙语和葡萄牙语两种语言.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 双语（Bilingual）是指在某个国家或某个地区有两个（或两个以上）民族同时存在，两种或两种以上文化共存，可能或必须同时运用两 …

在我国双语教学(Bilingual Education)是指高等院校的部分专业基础课和专业课同时采用两种语言(母语和英语)进行授课的一种教学方式。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin bilinguis, from bi- 'having two' + lingua 'tongue' + -al

entry.tran: 双语的；涉及两种语言的；使用两种语言的
entry.def: Bilingual means involving or using two languages.

entry.tran: 双语的；能说两种语言的
entry.def: Someone who is bilingual can speak two languages equally well, usually because they learned both languages as a child.

example.ex: He is bilingual in an Asian language and English.
example.tran: 他会说一门亚洲语言和一门英语。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who speaks two languages fluently

auth_sentence.content: My surroundings were bilingual, therefore I was.
auth_sentence.res_content: My surroundings were bilingual, therefore I was.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My surroundings were bilingual, therefore I was.

auth_sentence.content: Overall, how many Canadians are bilingual?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Overall, how many Canadians are bilingual?

auth_sentence.content: Most speakers of a minority language are also bilingual speakers of Russian.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most speakers of a minority language are also bilingual speakers of Russian.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most speakers of a minority language are also bilingual speakers of Russian.

Sentence.sentence: In fact, most children outside of the United States are expected to become bilingual or even, in many cases, multilingual.

means.word_mean: 两种语言的;能说两种语言的;用两种语言（写）的

sentences.en: He is virtually bilingual in Spanish and Portuguese.
sentences.cn: 他实际上讲西班牙语和葡萄牙语两种语言。
